title: Reverse Bits API Test
description: Reverse bits of a given 32 bits unsigned integer.
problem_statement: Reverse bits of a given 32 bits unsigned integer.
constraints: Input must be a binary string of length 32

examples.explanation: The input binary string is reversed.

diagram.chart:
flowchart TD
    A[Start] --> B{Loop 32 times}
    B --> C[Shift res left]
    C --> D[Add last bit of n]
    D --> E[Shift n right]
    E --> B
diagram.title: Bit Reversal Flow
